meanings.definition: To break down or fail suddenly.

meanings.sent2: The computer conked right before the important presentation.
meanings.sent3: The blender decided to conk out just when she needed it for the smoothie.
meanings.sent4: His energy seemed to conk out after a long day at work.
meanings.sent5: The tired engine conked out, leaving them stranded on the road.
